title: RANK, PLEASE HELP ME
body: Hi so around 11:20pm on November 7 i started a game in ranked for my last promos game to diamond and i won!!. i might have ended around 12 or abit before. i will still be getting my diamond borders right ? cause op.gg says i was plat 1 100 lp last season and its stressing me out.... and correct me if im wrong but i thought if you could get into loading screen by 11:59 the game would count for people below masters ?

replies.body:
What time zone are you referring to? If it was PST, you should be fine, because as you mentioned as long as you were in the loading screen prior to midnight, that game would be counted. Your account shows you at Diamond 5 in our system, so I think you're in the clear.

Let me know if you have any questions.
